class.name: teleop_controllers/JointImpedanceController
class.description: The joint impedance controller subscribes to desired joint position.

class.name: teleop_controllers/CartesianImpedanceController
class.description: The cartesian impedance controller subscribes to desired pose of EE.

class.name: teleop_controllers/HapticGravityCompensationController
class.description: The haptic gravity compensation controller applies gravity compensation and gives haptic feedback based on the external forces acting on the robot.

class.name: teleop_controllers/GravityCompensationExampleController
class.description: The gravity compensation controller only sends zero torques so that the robot does gravity compensation

class.name: teleop_controllers/JointImpedanceExampleController
class.description: The joint impedance example controller moves joint 4 and 5 in a very compliant periodic movement.

class.name: teleop_controllers/CartesianImpedanceExampleController
class.description: The cartesian impedance example controller moves the robot to a small offset from the current position.

class.name: teleop_controllers/MoveToStartExampleController
class.description: The move to start example controller moves the robot into default pose.

class.name: teleop_controllers/JointPositionExampleController
class.description: Dummy position controller to starting pose.

class.name: teleop_controllers/ModelExampleController
class.description: The franka model example controller evaluates and prints the dynamic model of Franka Robotics Robots.

class.name: teleop_controllers/CartesianImpedanceDeltaController
class.description: The cartesian impedance delta controller subscribes to desired pose offsets of EE.

class.name: teleop_controllers/GravityCompensationWithJointTorqueFeedbackController
class.description: The gravity compensation with joint torque feedback controller applies gravity compensation and adds the joint torque feedback to the commanded torques.

class.name: franka_ext_torque_broadcaster/FrankaExtTorqueBroadcaster
class.description: Publishes filtered external torques applied on Franka arms.

class.name: franka_torque_broadcaster/FrankaTorqueBroadcaster
class.description: Publishes joint torques commanded to Franka arms.
